dialogues.text: Grant! (he whistles again) - Bond rises, ready to strike. - Rhoda steps in front of the truck, whistles again, and reaches up to close the hood. Bonds leaps forward and sla it shut on Rhoda's arms. Bond grabs Rhoda's hair.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Excuse me. - Bond punches him in the face. - Rhoda falls to the ground. Bond kneels, pulls off Rhoda belt and ties his wrists behind his back. - The train continues into the distance. - Bond frisks Rhoda, finds a gun and tosses it aside. The rolls Rhoda over. - Bond lifts Rhoda, places him in the passenger seat of t truck and shuts the door.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Now don't run away.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: lies sleeping behind the trees. Bond runs to her.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Come on! She moans.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Come on or I'll leave you here!

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: Stay here with me! Bond picks up his briefcase and the Lektor with one hand pulls Tania up with the other.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: (exclaiming) Ooh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PAN on them as they run along the tracks to the truck. Bo lifts Tania into the bed of the truck atop the flowers.  126.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Sleep it off in there. You'll feet better in the morning. Tania rolls onto her side, her eyes flickering closed. we hear the hatch close.

dialogues.speaker: AT THE DRIVER'S SIDE OF THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: Bond opens the driver's door climbs behind the wheel. Rho is still unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Come on, wake up. Rhoda barely moves. Bond closes the door and drives away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck approaches.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: Bond continues to drive, Rhoda still unconscious beside h

dialogues.speaker: THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: continues along the road.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE HELICOPTER
dialogues.text: The PILOT and a GUARD holding a rifle look down at the tr

dialogues.speaker: THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: continues down the road.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: behind the wheel looks up at the chopper.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: - The chopper's passenger waves at Bond to stop driving. - Bond looks forward, ignoring him. - The helicopter flies across the truck, circles around a flies back. - The pilot and passenger look down at the truck. - From their POV, ZOOM IN on Tania looking up at them.  127. - The chopper whizzes past overhead, the passenger still waiving at Bond to stop. - Bond glances up but keeps driving. - The helicopter flies over the truck. - Bond glances up again but keeps driving. - The helicopter flies over the truck again. - Its tail passes directly above the bed of the truck. Ta looks up. - The helicopter circles again. - The passenger holds a hand grenade and pulls out the pi with his teeth. - The chopper zooms right overhead. - An explosion goes off right behind the truck. - Bond ducks but keeps driving. - The chopper zooms right overhead again. - Bond looks up then back at the road. - The chopper zooms across the truck. - The passenger holds another hand grenade.

dialogues.speaker: PILOT
dialogues.text: Try and straddle the truck. The passenger nods, pulls the pin out with his teeth and over the side. - From their POV, they cross the truck again. - Another explosion goes off behind the truck. - The helicopter zooms right overhead again. - Another explosion goes off, this one beside the truck. truck stops. - Bond gets out, looking up at the chopper - The chopper circles around again. - Bond rushes out with the Lektor and his folded rifle an slams the door behind him.  128. Bond runs to the back of the truck. Tania looks up at him.

dialogues.speaker: BOND, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I'll get them away from here! You hide under the truck. Bond runs forward again and looks up. The helicopter zooms by right overhead. Bond runs away from the truck and up a hill. From the chopper's POV, we see Bond running onto the hilltop. The chopper passes by right in front of us. The chopper passes over Bond and he drops to the ground. The chopper zooms away. Tania peers around the back of the truck then climbs underneath it. The chopper zooms right overhead again. From the chopper's POV, Bond runs forward as the chopper tries to run him down. Bond drops flat to the ground and chopper continues on. Bond looks up at the chopper. The chopper starts to circle again. Bond runs forward. The chopper flies right at us. From the chopper's POV, Bond runs over the crest of the h then ducks as the chopper passes by. The chopper starts to circle again. Bond turns and looks up. The chopper flies right over him and he drops to the grou again as it passes by. He jumps to his feet and runs forw again. The chopper flies right at us again. From the chopper's POV, Bond runs back up the hillside th drops to the ground.  129. - The chopper circles again. - Bond runs off. - The chopper, nearly at ground level, chases him. Bond d over an outcropping of rock and the chopper passes over h It starts to circle. Bond emerges from behind the rock an runs up the hill toward us. - Bond runs behind another rock formation. He lies back t let the rock shelter him. - The chopper passes right overhead again. - Bond picks up his folding rifle. - The chopper circles again. - Bond assembles the rifle. - The chopper now hovers directly overhead. - The passenger leans out holding a grenade. - Bond aims the rifle at the chopper. - The chopper continues to hover. - Bond fires the rifle. The bullet strikes the passenger and he drops the grenade inside the chopper. He and the pilot struggle frantically reach it. - The chopper explodes in a ball of flame. - Bond looks up. - The chopper drops spinning from the sky. - ZOOM IN on Bond as he covers his face. - The chopper keeps tumbling. - ZOOM FURTHER IN on Bond. An explosion 0.S. bathes him i red. - The chopper on the ground explodes again. - Bond leans against the rock as smoke wafts by. His hat gone. - The chopper explodes yet again.  130. - Bond looks around the corner of the rock at it. Then, picking up the Lektor, he crawls forward, leaving his hat behind. He runs downhill from the burning chopper.

dialogues.speaker: THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: Rhoda sits fuming in the passenger seat, muttering to him in Russian. Tania walks up to the driver's window and lea against it, pleased. Bond turns toward them. Rhoda keeps muttering. TRUCK FORWARD to Bond arriving. Ta hugs him.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: Oh, Ja —- Right behind them the chopper explodes yet another time. shields Tania with his body then looks back.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: I'd say one of their aircraft is missing. He and Tania turn toward the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck drives down a road and stops at the jetty where motor launch waits. It bears four fuel drums. Bond emerges from the truck wearing a skipper's cap. He g the Lektor, briefcase and rifle and hurries to the back o truck, where Tania was riding.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Tania? She climbs down holding her sweater.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (hands her the briefcase) Here, take this and cast the rope off.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: All right. She runs forward. Bond passes behind the truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bond stops at the passenger door and opens it.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Where's the key? No response. Bond jabs the barrel of the rifle into Rhoda neck.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Where's the key?

dialogues.speaker: RHODA
dialogues.text: In my coat. In the pocket. Bond lifts Rhoda's coat and takes a key from the pocket.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: All right, get out. Move! Rhoda climbs out of the truck.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: In the boat! Rhoda runs down the jetty to the boat. Tania is untying t back rope. Bond follows carrying the Lektor, rifle and Rhoda's coat. He unties the front rope and the three of t climb aboard. Bond starts the engine and the boat moves o

dialogues.speaker: ON THE BOAT
dialogues.text: The three of them stand looking through the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (to Rhoda) Can you swim? Rhoda looks away.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (to Tania) Here, take the wheel. (to Rhoda) This way, please. Bond leads Rhoda to the back of the boat.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Oop, mind the step! He makes Rhoda step up onto the edge of the boat. Tania l back. Bond unstraps Rhoda's belt from his wrists.  132.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: It just isn't your day, is it? Bond pushes him over the side of the boat into the water. Rhoda screams back at him in Russian. Tania smiles as Bond walks back to her.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: Where are we going?

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Venice. Look in that locker, will you? She passes him and he takes the wheel. She opens the locker.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: Chart, pistol, some flares...

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Here, give me those charts. She hands him a chart. He unfolds it on the cabin and loo at it.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (pointing at the map) Yes, we're here. Near Istria. He looks back and sees the four fuel drums.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Well, we've got plenty of fuel. With a bit of luck we should be there by tomorrow morning.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD'S CAT
dialogues.text: He strokes it.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Three men were found dead on the train at Trieste. One of them was Grant. PULL BACK to reveal:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blofeld swivels forward to face Kleb and Kronsteen.  133.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD
dialogues.text: What do you have to say, Number Five?

dialogues.speaker: KRONSTEEN
dialogues.text: He was Kleb's choice. Her people failed.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: (to Kronsteen) It was your plan! They followed it implicitly.

dialogues.speaker: KRONSTEEN
dialogues.text: Impossible. It was perfect.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: Except for one thing. They were dealing with Bond!

dialogues.speaker: KRONSTEEN
dialogues.text: Who is Bond... compared to Kronsteen? Blofeld continues stroking his cat.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Exactly. What have you to say to that, Number Three? Kleb looks at him fearfully. Blofeld presses a white button on his desk. Morzeny enters through the doorway behind them. DOLLY IN he approaches the desk.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD
dialogues.text: Bond is still alive and the Lektor is not yet in our possession. I have already negotiated with the Russians to return it to them. We've agreed a price. And SPECTRE always delivers what it promises. Our whole organization depends on our keeping those promises. Morzeny quietly puts his feet together and a knife shoots of the toe of one of his boots.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD
dialogues.text: (still stroking his cat) I warned you. We do not tolerate failure, Number Three.  134. Kronsteen looks smugly at Kleb. Kleb sweats profusely.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: You know the penalty?

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: Yes, Number One. The boot with the knife leans back, preparing to strike.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Our rules are very simple. Kleb keeps sweating. Kronsteen turns smugly to Blofeld. Blofeld keeps stroking his cat.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: If you fail... Morzeny's boot turns sideways toward Kronsteen, and sudde kicks him in the ankle. Kronsteen cries out in pain and doubles over. Kleb looks on, amazed. Kronsteen rises, a look of total incomprehension on his f He starts to fall then braces himself against the edge of Blofeld's desk. DOLLY BACK. Kronsteen shakes his head at Blofeld in disbelief and slowly sinks to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD
dialogues.text: Twelve seconds. One day we must invent a faster working venom. -- Number Three.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: (snapping to attention) Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: BLOFELD, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I do not wish to have to tell the Russians that there will be another delay.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: There will be no delay, Number One. There's still time.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Bond's boat races across the water in the distance, leavi white wake.  135.

dialogues.speaker: IN THE BOAT
dialogues.text: Tania licks her finger and holds it to the wind. Bond, steering, smiles at her.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: Which way are we going?

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: The shortest route. (holds up the chart) Which is between those two mountains... He points to mountains looming up ahead.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: and straight along the coast. They look peacefully into the distance. Suddenly a motorboat rounds a point in front of them, hea for them.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: spins the wheel, turning back in the direction they came throwing a wide wash behind. They race ahead at full throttle. They hear Morzeny's voice calling through a megaphone: MORZENY (filtered) Ahoy, Mister Bond! Tania looks back.

dialogues.speaker: THE MOTORBOAT
dialogues.text: races to catch up. MORZENY (filtered) Ahoy, Mister Bond!

dialogues.speaker: THE MOTORBOAT
dialogues.text: Morzeny holds the megaphone and stands beside the PILOT; SPECTRE MEN sit behind him. MORZENY (filtered) (to Bond) Heave to! Heave to!  136.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: glances back then puts on even more speed. Suddenly he sees another motorboat up ahead round a point race at him, then another. He swerves to avoid them, completing another half arc. MORZENY (filtered) You're trapped, Mister Bond! You're trapped! You cannot escape! You cannot escape!

dialogues.speaker: THE SEA
dialogues.text: Bond's boat speeds ahead, leaving a wide wake, with three motorboats racing after it. ZOOM BACK to an even wider an

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: speeds forward. One of his men kneels on the bow aiming a machine gun. Morzeny barks orders into the megaphone: MORZENY (filtered) Rifle grenade, prepare to fire!

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: The other two boats are right ahead, chasing Bond's boat b.g. On each bow a man crouches with a machine gun. MORZENY (filtered) We're coming through! Pull over, SPECTRE Green! (lowers the megaphone and waves) Get out of the way! His boat passes between the other two.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: (to a man behind him) Give them a warning shot! The man behind him fires a rifle grenade.

dialogues.speaker: BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: An explosion occurs just behind it.

dialogues.speaker: ON MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: He calls through the megaphone to the boat on his left.  137. MORZENY (filtered) Rifle grenade fire! A man on that boat fires a rifle grenade.

dialogues.speaker: BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: An explosion occurs right in front of it.

dialogues.speaker: ON MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: He calls through the megaphone to the man on his bow. MORZENY (filtered) Forward machine gun fire!

dialogues.speaker: ANOTHER BOAT
dialogues.text: A man fires a rifle grenade.

dialogues.speaker: BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Another explosion occurs behind it and we hear machine gu fire.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: The man on the bow is firing his machine gun. Morzeny cal through the megaphone to the two boats behind him. MORZENY (filtered) You're firing too close!

dialogues.speaker: ON ANOTHER BOAT
dialogues.text: A man fires another rocket grenade.

dialogues.speaker: BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Another explosion occurs behind it. MORZENY (0.S., filtered) SPECTRE Red, SPECTRE Green, you're firing too close!

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: He turns to the boats behind him. A man on his stern fire another grenade.

dialogues.speaker: ON BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Tania looks back. An explosion occurs right behind her. T three SPECTRE boats follow in b.g.  138.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Morzeny continues on the megaphone. MORZENY (filtered) (to the others) You're trying to stop them, not to sink them!

dialogues.speaker: ON BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Bond glances back. Machine-gun fire and another explosion erupt behind him. Tania ducks and looks back.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: comes right at them, the man on the bow firing his machin gun.

dialogues.speaker: ON BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Bond glances back at the fuel drum. Bullets puncture each them and fuel pours out. Bond keeps looking. More fuel. He touches Tania's arm.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Here, take the wheel! Tania takes the wheel. Bond turns, unties the drums and pushes three of them off the boat. They splash into the water. PAN BACK to show the drums floating between Bond's boat and the others.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: raises a pair of binoculars. He sees the drums in the wat

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: (to skipper) Slow down! The three boats pass one of the fuel drums. ZOOM BACK to wide angle.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: Slow down all boats! Green, go alongside, while we keep you covered.  139.

dialogues.speaker: BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Bond rolls the last fuel drum off the boat. It splashes i the water. Bond starts to reach down.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hands up, Mister Bond! Bond raises his hands as Tania looks back.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: Why are you giving up? Without those drums the boat must be lighter. We can go faster.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Hand me that Very Pistol.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY'S BOAT
dialogues.text: He calls to Bond through the megaphone.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: Keep your hands up, Mr. Bond. We're sending a boat along to take you off.

dialogues.speaker: ON BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: Tania hands Bond the pistol. He aims and fires it.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: - A fuel drum blows up. - The fuel in the water explodes around the SPECTRE boats Bond speeds away. - Bond fires the pistol again. - More explosions in the water. - Flames roar up.

dialogues.speaker: ON BOND'S BOAT
dialogues.text: He glances back grinning.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (to Tania) There's a saying in England: ‘where there's smoke there's fire.'  140.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: - Two SPECTRE boats collide amidst the flames and smoke, setting off an explosion between them. The man on the bow one of the boats catches fire and jumps overboard. - Morzeny's boat comes forward through the flames.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: (yelling at another boat) Green, change your course! - The other boat passes through deep smoke and, when it emerges, the man on the bow is gone. - Morzeny yells at the others:

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: All boats, toss your ammunition! Get rid of it -- quick! - PAN across a boat on fire. - Morzeny stands on his burning boat, waving back at the boats.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: Get rid of it! - On another boat, the man on the bow shields his face ag the flames. - Flames engulf Morzeny's boat. - It passes through more fire. - Fire burns on the water. - Morzeny calls to his men.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: Quick as you can! Let's jump! - His boat passes into a cauldron of flame. - Morzeny is ablaze. He falls backwards into the water.

dialogues.speaker: MORZENY
dialogues.text: (screaming) Ahhh! - His boat explodes.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: laying serenely on the Mediterranean.

dialogues.speaker: ON A HOTEL BALCONY
dialogues.text: Tania sits in a chair. A champagne bottle and glasses are the table beside her, and Bond stands lighting her cigare DOLLY IN. Bond wears a shirt and tie but no jacket. He kisses the back of her neck. A phone rings inside.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Don't go away. He goes into their room. PAN on him through the window as walks to the phone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bond picks up the phone.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (into phone) Yes?... Oh, thanks. Tell him to wait, will you? And, uh, send up a porter for the luggage... Thank you. A knock sounds at the door.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (calling back in Italian) Avanti! The door to the suite opens and Kleb enters dressed as a chambermaid.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: (in Italian) Permesso, signor. (By your leave, sir.)

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (in Italian) Si, prego. (Yes, please.) Kleb shuts the door and walks off.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (into phone) And also, uh, get me the British Consul... Thank you.  142. He replaces the receiver. PAN on him as he walks to a tab where the Lektor sits and shuts the case. Kleb, behind hi is dusting a couch. Bond picks up his shoulder holster, which hung over a cha the table, and walks into the bedroom putting it on. DOLLY IN on Kleb. She walks to the table and picks up the Lektor. The phone suddenly rings again. She sets the Lektor down takes an ashtray from the table.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: emerges from the bedroom. PAN on him as he grabs his coat from the chair, passes Kleb holding the ashtray, goes to phone putting his coat on and picks up the phone.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (into phone) Yes?... Oh, Mister Maxwell, please... James Bond.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: enters the salon, holding a green coat over her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: James, we will miss the plane and we will... She freezes, seeing Kleb.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: looks at Tania and puts a finger to her lips, shushing he

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: DOLLY IN on her as she mouths the words, "Rosa Kleb."

dialogues.speaker: BOND, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (into phone) Hello, Paul. Bond here. Just to tell you we're off in a few minutes and I want to thank you for everything. And signal the office we are on our way back, will you?

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Tania stands in b.g. near the door. Kleb, holding a suitc picks up the Lektor from the table and turns toward the d  143.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (continuing) . What was that? (he sees Kleb and points) Here, leave that! I'll take it. Kleb sets the Lektor down.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: listens on the phone and laughs.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: What?... Oh, no. It should be routine from here on in. Y'know, so many times-- He looks off at Kleb and stops.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: aims a gun at him.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: stares at her. Meanwhile we hear Paul over the phone: PAUL (filtered) Hello, what was that you're saying? Hello, hello?

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: gestures to him to hang up.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Realization crosses his face.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (to himself) Kleb.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: gestures again for him to hang up.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Again we hear Paul over the phone: PAUL (filtered) James! Are you still there? Hello!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bond puts the phone down.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: makes an upward gesture with the gun.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: turns and puts his hands up.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: looks at Bond shaking her head, as if to say she's not in this.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: looks at her in chagrin then glances down.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Romanova!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bond stands in f.g. with his arms raised as Tania and Kle stand in b.g.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: The door!

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: looks at Tania.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: looks back, shaking her head again.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: (yelling now) Romanova!

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: glances at Tania.

dialogues.speaker: THREE -SHOT
dialogues.text: Tania opens the door. DOLLY UP as Kleb walks over to Bond takes his gun and tosses it aside.  145.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: looks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kleb picks up the Lektor and hands it to Tania.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: Take this. Tania takes it from her.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: watches.

dialogues.speaker: THE DOORWAY
dialogues.text: Tania steps out into the hall with the Lektor. DOLLY IN a Kleb starts closing the door, still aiming at Bond.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: watches.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: DOLLY IN closer on she closes the door further, still aim at Bond.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: DOLLY IN CLOSE as he watches.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB
dialogues.text: Suddenly the door bursts open and Tania lunges in and gra Kleb.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: - The gun lands on the floor. - Bond lunges forward. - Tania falls to the floor as Kleb rises, facing Bond. Sh backs away ripping off her cap. - Bond runs forward then hesitates. - Kleb knocks her feet together. A knife shoots out from toe of one of her shoes.  146.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: backs away and grabs a chair, aiming it to block her, and steps forward.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB'S FEET
dialogues.text: They step forward. She shouts and kicks out with her shoe Bond's feet approach her. TILT UP as he pushes the chair against her and pins her to the wall. She curses at him i Russian and tries to hit him.

dialogues.speaker: BOND'S FACE
dialogues.text: Her fist misses him.

dialogues.speaker: KLEB'S FEET
dialogues.text: Her knifed foot keeps kicking at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bond keeps Kleb pinned against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: on the floor on her side grabs Bond's gun, rolls onto her and aims it at one and then the other.

dialogues.speaker: BOND AND KLEB

dialogues.text: Bond and Tania ride in the back seat. He wears his suit a she her green coat. She takes the wedding ring off her fi and hands it to him.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: Here you are, in case you ever need it again.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (taking it) Oh, yes. All government property has to be accounted for. (slips the ring into his pocket) But as I said before: ‘We won't always be working on the company's time,' will we?

dialogues.text: No. They kiss, Bond squeezing Tania's shoulder.  148.

dialogues.speaker: FAVORING BOND
dialogues.text: They continue to kiss then Tania suddenly sits upright an straightens her hair.

dialogues.speaker: TANIA
dialogues.text: James, behave yourself! We are being filmed! Surprised, he glances back.

dialogues.speaker: A BRIDGE OVERHEAD
dialogues.text: An ELDERLY COUPLE stands on the bridge. The man films the the woman takes snapshots.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: Oh, not again! He takes the reel of film given to him by Grant from his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: FAVORING BOND
dialogues.text: He unspools the start of the roll and holds it up to the light.

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: (looking at it) He was right,,you know. [What a performance! ]

dialogues.speaker: TANIA

dialogues.speaker: BOND
dialogues.text: I'll show you. He slings an arm around her and they kiss. TILT UP to the canal. Bond's hand rises into frame holding the reel, swi it around and tosses it.
